titles.title: A bill to rescind budget authority for the Office of Elementary and Secondary Education for special programs transmitted to the Congress by the President on January 5, 1987, in accordance with section 1012 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

bill.summary: 1/29/1987--Introduced. Rescinds budget authority for the Office of Elementary and Secondary Education for special programs (R87-27).
